title: your account is in the process of transferring
body:
i havent played on my account for a long time.. but i really want to, but it says : your account is in the process of transferring league of legends

Help me?

My other account is on EU WEST

Username: NeXuSStAmPe

replies.body: I went ahead and pulled up your account and it looks like there was a hiccup during the transfer. We'll need to give it a little push to get the transfer completed, so hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll be able to get it taken care of!

So my main account is also in the process of transferring and it has been 3 days now. I don't know why it is transferring, I can not even log in to comment because the combination username/password is not available in the current region. I changed my password so hopefully Im not being hacked, but its is really frustrating because I have a lot of RP left on the account. Please help, I really want to keep playing, its really boring this summer without league.

Account name is : aznnetfreak
is it fixed now? I have this problem now

Just wanted to add that I'm dealing with the same on my account. I never authorized any transfer; got kicked off the client because someone else logged in from elsewhere, then got the message "your account is in the process of transferring". I've already sent a ticket, but I'm afraid my IP or RP was used for this transfer and I don't want to lose any!

Username: Magic0loc0
Region (pre-transfer, at least): EUW
